name: MD - Billing Form Data Migration
description: A system to automate clinical data migration from printed clinical billing documents by extracting text from regions of interest and storing it with minimal human intervention.
role: Worked with a team of ML Engineers, identifying techniques and implementing them
Developed the overall application architecture providing a configurable, robust solution
Built an image alignment and scaling module using homography matrices computed on ORB features via OpenCV
Developed an ROI extractor module to extract marked regions containing required field information
Created an ensemble OCR module using both Tesseract and EasyOCR with confidence scoring
Worked on post-processing to clean keywords and store best results, applying regex for additional cleansing
Devised a scoring strategy to improve overall system performance across various configurations per document
